## Interactive Map with Leaflet

This page features an interactive map created with the Leaflet package in R. The map shows a simple location with a marker.

Date 21.03.2025

### Map

```{r}
library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = 144.9631, lat = -37.8136, popup = "Melbourne, Australia")

```
